评论概述: Expensive but cheaply made. So thin you can see through it.
评论详情: Since I paid over $100 for this poorly and cheaply made sweater, I don’t feel it even deserves one star. I was hoping for a high-quality, cuddly, and soft sweater because I wanted a cashmere sweater all my life…how utterly disappointing to be ripped off by a product from China, again.
It fits well and is definitely long enough in the arms which as a tall woman is a bonus! Is way more expensive than it warrants as it's not the best cashmere, but a blend.

评论概述: Quality was not as expected for the cost.
评论详情: I returned this sweater because I did not like the quality.  For a sweater to cost over $100, it should have been MUCH better quality.  It was very thin and the edges were not hemmed.
Love this sweater. Lightweight but warm and very flattering
Very snug. I’m 5’6”, 140 pounds & normally wear a medium & I purchased the large & it was more form fitting than I anticipated. I do love the thumb holes in it!

评论概述: Odd proportions; tight in the arms & loose in the body
评论详情: Super soft fabric.  Lovely faun / taupe color.  I *really* *wanted* to love this sweater.  But I couldn't get over the discomfort in super tight arms (felt somewhat like a blood pressure cuff before it tightens; arm length was as expected, falling mid-hand) and wide cut in torso (wasn't flattering from any styling: untucked, French tuck, fully tucked).  Perhaps this sweater is better suited to a body that is thicker through the middle with thin arms.
Beautiful sweater. The dark navy color is lovely, the fit is flattering.

This was literally the cheapest feeling material for an over inflated price.  It’s only 15% cashmere and it is not soft. Extremely thin material.  I did the try before you buy thank goodness because it is NOT worth the price.  I’d pay maybe 25 dollars max for this.

评论概述: Good purchase but runs a little small for my taste
评论详情: Runs a little small. I’m thin with weirdly long arms.  I like this brand bc the arms are always long enough. This shirt verges on being a smidge small even though I bought a medium. I’m wearing it now as a layering piece in 7 degree weather. Very comfortable and warm.

评论概述: Poor Quality for the Price and Too Small
评论详情: $122.92 for a too snug fit and poor quality. Supposedly it has 15% cashmere. Returning it.

For over a hundred I at least expected the thumb holes to be on the correct side. It’s not a bog deal to twist the sleeves around so I’m not returning it. I don’t mind the un hemmed sleeves personally, but some do so there’s that. It’s very flattering and soft. Perfect for layering. I live in the south so I prefer shirts that are thinner and easily layered. I don’t really have any complaints other than the price. For that I’d expect it to be perfect.

评论概述: Update: Must return size L, too, cuz wasn't larger than a M/ Nice except for M fit, have to return.
评论详情: Update: I returned the Medium and bought a Large. Well, the Large is basically the same sized as a Medium. The only thing different is it is longer and the sleeves are longer. Do NOT try to get a bigger size with this sweater, it won't happen. Really disappointed! I'm so unhappy to have spent the time returning and buying another at the same price only to get the same size! Bigger means bigger all around, as in around the waist. What's so hard about that to understand?? Again: the arms are still the same size, the waist is the same, only the length of the garment and the length of the sleeves are longer.  This doesn't come in a size extra Large, though if it did, I wouldn't be surprised if their was not change in waist or sleeve  circumference. What the heck? Still waiting on my refund for the first sweater that was too small even though I measure according to the chart. Ah well -- most of the stuff I buy here is appropriately sized, so I guess one takes the good with the bad.

This is one of three of these shirts that I purchased, unfortunately the dark Grey that I purchased arrived with three small holes in the front of the shirt.  I will say that as I mentioned above, I have two other shirts, dark blue and light grey, and I absolutely love them.
I layer this sweater so I like them snug. The V Neck runs differently across the shoulders. I am exchanging for a size smaller than my crew neck enza.  Best sweaters ever.
Soft to the touch, flattering fit and beautiful color..... The thumb hole feature is spot on! I'm thinking of ordering a second sweater!

I love the look of this sweater and how they did the seams, but I'm closer to 3 stars on this and here's why:  CONS: - As others have commented this sweater is VERY thin - like a thin see-through t-shirt. - For the price, I would have expected something more substantial. - The issue with it being very very thin is its exceptionally clingy - and not in a good way. It rolls up at the bottom and hugs every single bump and curve and roll - So as long as you don't mind having all of your body show (good and otherwise), you'll like it. But if you like a sweater to come down and hide some of those Mom rolls, well, this sweater is far too thin and clingy to do that. - The beige color is green-ish. When I hold it against my true beige/brown clothing, this looks almost like a (soft) army green beige tone. - I'm a size 8/9 (36 B/C chest) and got a large, and its very fitted  PROS - Its soft - Seaming (lines) are stylish - Finger holes are great to keep my hands warm - Feels good on despite the thinness  Overall I like it and won't return it, but I wouldn't buy it again.
Great quality

评论概述: Absolutely love the cashmere blend. Very refined, classy chic and flattering top, worth every penny
评论详情: I had already purchased a dress from Enza Costa collection, I love the style, quality and fit I use this top both as beautiful long sleeve t shirt and a nicely snug lightweight sweater. I have read a few reviews complaining that it is not 100% cashmere, but to me the cashmere blend is PERFECT. It gives it the right amount of stretching and such softness! The top is chic, comfy-cozy and flattering. It’s all I want to wear, especially since COVID. I Also love the thumbholes – which I use or not depending on my mood. This is a luxurious and refined top, consistent with the brand. To me, it is worth every penny… and more!
I purchased this in 2 colors.  I love: The thumb holes, the fabric is lightweight yet warm and soft, and the fit is very flattering.  It is long without being "super long".  I may buy a 3rd!

评论概述: CHEAP CASHMERE THAT IS NOT WORTH THE PRICE
评论详情: This is extremely thin. It is very cheap cashmere and for $160, there is no way it is worth it. Please, save your money.  It was put in the packaging haphazardly, causing it to become so wrinkled that I was forced to get it dry cleaned immediately if I wanted to wear it anytime soon. Again, please save your money. Don’t buy this.
This sweater barely has cashmere in it but has a cashmere price tag.  Do not recommend at this price.  WAY over priced for cashmere content.  You would do better elsewhere
Just wonderful fit and comfy soft fill. Wish they had more colors! Fits well
Very comfortable light weight keeps you warm and cozy. Love it!
Very pleasant to wear, it fits perfectly!
Not worth the value. Sleeves didn’t even have a sewn hem line

This is my favorite go to sweater top. It has all the qualities of daytime wear to evening wear. I specially like the finger hole. It's beautiful, comfortable and just the right amount of clingyness. True-fit. I like the grey. I am on my second one because I wore the first one out.

This fabric is a fabulous mixed of cashmere and cotton.  It’s total luxury . I love how soft it feels. It’s not too warm as it’s thin and still is perfect for a chill evening or morning. It’s like a second skin. I love the red color and with the V neck it’s flattering. I ll definitely buy other colors of it also ...

I love the materials and it's consistent with the brand -- i now have four tops and they all feel so luxurious! The neck is a low cut which I lilke because i can layer under it too. Love the different arm finishing. So simple and also so versatile!
I love this designer.  Enzo Costa is very slimming.  Many compliments

Really love the style and 100% cotton material but kinda pricey at $100+.  Also they do stretch out as the day goes on so order down if that's your preference. I have both black and cream color, love them but feel guilty spending that much money for basic top.

评论概述: Its a t-shirt but also a light sweater
评论详情: I love this brand. The shirts are form-fitting but not too tight and the longer length suits my taller frame. They are warm but not too warm. I plan on buying more
Second time I wore it, one of the sleeves started to desintegrate

I like the fit and the fabric is very comfortable. Its a perfect combination of a sweater and a tshirt. The thumbholes gave it the perfect touch. I have bought essentials from other brands but this one is my favorite!
